item.title: consulting
item.description: I consult on projects that require skill with computation or math. For rates and availability, please write to consulting@arnavsood.com.

item.title: quotes
writing
item.description: Here are some things I’ve written. Non-Fiction “Bounded Rationality” — Blanket Sea. Pushcart Prize nominee.

item.title: links
item.description: Some things I think are worth sharing. WIPP: How to warn people 10000 years from now about radioactive waste. Sylvia Jacobson: Was confined to a skyjacked plane for a week, and wrote a paper about it. Ken Liu: State Change (short story). 129 Cars: This American Life (WBEZ Chicago) spends a month at a car dealership. The Glass Room: A digital art exhibit by Mozilla, focused on examining issues of data and privacy.

item.title: about
item.description: I’m a Predoctoral Fellow in Economics at UBC, working primarily with Jesse Perla on computational macro. I’m also part of the team at QuantEcon, where I work on Julia and infrastructure projects. My email’s arnav.sood@ubc.ca. If you’re on campus, my office is in the Iona building. If you prefer to communicate securely, here’s my PGP public key.
